Copywriting:

You'll read all over the internet that you have X number of seconds to catch the attention of your reader. I’m sure one of those numbers is correct, but the simpler and true answer is: you need to catch them with your headline, and then you need to re-catch them with the next line, and the next line, and followed by (you guessed it) the next line.

So how do you keep a reader engaged line-by-line and convince them to do whatever you’re asking them to do (buy a product, buy your services, donate to a cause)? You fail a lot until you figure out what works—or you just hire someone like me who’s already done that.

I deliver copy that:

  • Answers your reader's questions
  • Engages them
  • Builds trust with your brand
  • Persuades readers to put aside their objections
  • Converts them into customers

Content Writing:

You probably know this already, but writing good content takes forever. Sure, the internet will tell you that you can fart out a blog post in under 2 hours, but what they don't tell you is no one is going to read it.

A blog post can take 10 hours to complete from ideation to final proofread--and that's if you know what you're doing (and if nothing goes wrong). As a business owner or subject matter expert, you probably have great ideas for content and a wealth of knowledge that you should share, but do you have 10+ hours a week or a month to research, write, edit, and publish a blog post?

I deliver content that:

  • Readers enjoy
  • Establishes your brand
  • Is delivered in a timely manner
  • Drives traffic to your site
  • Strengthens the connection with your customers

Editing Services:

Editing is tedious, boring (so boring), so let's cut to the chase: pawn it off on me--I deserve the punishment anyway.

Did you know that there are different types of editing? It's not just proofreading for spelling mistakes. I specialize in a type of editing called "substantive editing" or "developmental editing." This type of editing looks at a piece of writing at the macro level and focuses on defining goals, identifing readers, and organizing the ideas.

I can provide:

  • Substantive editing
  • Copy editing
  • Proofreading
